messages.subject: Toryusai tsuba,  Kyo Shoami tsuba and Mito Sukemitsu wakizashi
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings everyone, I have recently reduced the price of the Mito Sukemitsu wakizashi on my website.  Also, a wonderful Toryusai tsuba as well as a Kyo Shoami
messages.messageBody:
Greetings everyone,

I have recently reduced the price of the Mito Sukemitsu wakizashi on my website. Also, a wonderful Toryusai tsuba as well as a Kyo Shoami tsuba, published in the book "Ai-Tsuba 100 Shu", have been added to the tosogu page. Please have a look if you have any interest. Thanks

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Best regards,
Danny Massey

http://www.nihontocraft.com/Toryusai_Tsuba.html
http://www.nihontocraft.com/KyoShoami_Tsuba.html
http://www.nihontocraft.com/Mito_Sukemitsu_Nihonto.html

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
